SPWRKSTA.title: SPWRKSTA
SPWRKSTA.description: Last week was your {response to _spfill1} working full time, part time, going to school, keeping house, or what? Please provide one response only. If your {response to _spfill1} was doing more than one of these last week, select the one closest to the top of the list.
enumDescriptions: With a job, but not at work because of temporary illness, vacation,
Unemployed, laid off, looking for work
